alert.note: Alert for Madison (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 31 at 4:41PM EDT until August 31 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of Big Bend Florida and south central Georgia, including the following counties, in Big Bend Florida, Madison. In south central Georgia, Brooks and Lowndes. * WHEN...Until 745 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. Overflowing poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 441 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1 and 1.5 inches of rain have fallen in the last 1 Hour. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Lake Park, Valdosta, I-75 At Exit 16, Remerton, Dasher, Clyattville, I-75 At Exit 11, Valdosta Regional Airport, I-75 At Exit 5, Twin Lakes, Kinderlou, Pinetta and Hanson. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
